title: Queensland election: Labor hopeful it will form government as Newman loses seat â as it happened | Australia news | The Guardian
summary: queensland mp refuses to endorse tony abbott as leader .
annastacia palaszczuk : i am hopeful we will form government .
bill shorten : annastacia brought the lnp to their knees .
campbell newman : my political career is over .
kate jones arrives at victory party : `` history was not written by me ''

documents.title: labor within grasp of government as newman loses seat
text: the night draws to a close in queensland with a stunning , remarkable , extraordinary result .
it 's too bad all those adjectives are overused because they are actually deserved in this case .
tonight : the result is unknown but labor are hopeful of forming government .
70.6 % of the vote is counted and labor has a swing of 11.4 % to it .
currently 43 seats have been called for labor and 40 for the lnp .
two for katter 's australian party and independent peter wellington retains his seat leaving two in play .
45 are needed to form government .
at the 2012 election labor was booted from government and left with just seven seats , it has since won two more in by-elections .
premier campbell newman lost the seat of ashgrove to kate jones .
he declared my political career is over and thanked mps for not bitching and moaning while the lnp undertook reforms .
annastacia palaszczuk said labor is hopeful of forming government and queensland had sent a message that it did not want its assets to be sold .

federal queensland mp jane prentice refused to endorse tony abbott as the person to lead the liberal party to the next election saying it would be very silly not to take some lessons from the queensland result .
an indigenous woman , leeanne enoch , was elected to the queensland for the first time , for labor , and labor also has its first indigenous male mp , billy gordon .
queensland elected , rob pyne , in cairns the first time a wheelchair user has been elected to queensland parliament .
former prime minister julia gillard called it a courageous campaign while former prime minister and queensland man kevin rudd called it a stunning result .
opposition leader , bill shorten , said abbott and newman suffered the consequences for not listening to queenslanders .
tony abbott is yet to make a statement on the result .
we will be back with the live blog bright and early tomorrow morning .
do join us again .
labor 's rob pyne was elected to the queensland parliament tonight , for the electorate of cairns .
he uses a wheelchair and is the first queensland mp to do so .
after gaining his law degree from queensland university of technology and working as regional disability liaison officer for james cook university , pyne entered politics in 2008 .
fred mcconnell ( @ fred dash ) rob pyne elected for labor in cairns .
# qldvotes
another nugget of gold from twitter : annastacia palaszczuk on stage at the university of queensland in 1989 , with bonus retro channel 9 cameraman in the background .
andrã© hock ( @ transparency a1 ) dad was a minister annastacia defending radio 4zzz right to stay on campus at uq 1989 # qldvotes # annastaciapalaszczuk
a montage of recent courier mail front pages .
we think the tweeter might be employing sarcasm .
max the lobbyist ( @ maxthelobbyist ) if only newman and the lnp could have got some fair media coverage , the result may have been different # qldvotes
yesterday jason wilson wrote that : the world is turning against austerity .
now it 's queensland 's turn .
his headline is starting to seem quite prescient .
the rapid decline in campbell newman 's popularity is a symptom of australia 's growing discontent with neoliberal economic policy

documents.title: queensland mp refuses to endorse tony abbott as leader
text: queensland federal mp , jane prentice , has refused to endorse tony abbott as the leader of the liberal party in the wake of the queensland election result .
asked directly if abbott is the man to lead the liberal to the next federal election on abc 24 she replied : well , that 's a discussion , is n't it ?
we need to look at where we 're going .
she said it would be very silly not to be worried and concerned about the result in queensland tonight .
i think we need to take lessons from that .
i think they 're lessons we will be discussing .
i think all members of parliament , not just in queensland but other states as well , will look at the results tonight and there is some serious questions coming out of it .
prentice said she has already told abbott he is not taking people with him and not explaining properly why the liberal party is undertaking its policies .

asked how widespread the feeling was that abbott is n't explaining himself she responded : look , i think everyone would - not everyone - i think most people would agree with that , we are not getting the message out there and results like today do n't help .
and finally , is somebody else better suited to the task of federal liberal leader ?
tony has been a very , very successful leader - he is our fourth longest serving leader of the party .
we need to examine what we are doing .
we work as a team .
i do n't think you can hang tony out to dry .

documents.title: annastacia palaszczuk : i am hopeful we will form government
text: annastacia palaszczuk has arrived at the labor election party and says while it is too close to call the election , history has been made .
well i certainly said it was a david and goliath battle and it certainly was .
who would have thought three years ago we would be making history tonight ?
it 's still too close to call but i 'm very hopeful that we will be able to form government .
palaszczuk says queensland is an amazing state and thanks her amazing caucus team and the great australian labor party .
we do it tough but we stand up and we get things done .
palaszczuk thanks the people of queensland for putting their trust back in the labor party .
she wishes campbell newman and his wife lisa all the very best for their future .
over the last three years i 've been travelling across queensland listening to queenslanders , we will continue to listen to you .
you have put your trust back in the labor party and my promise tonight is i will value that trust .
tonight queenslanders sent a very clear message and that message is they do not want their assets sold and we will keep our assets in public hands .
i want ot unite queensland , i want to pull queensland back together .
let 's put the past three years behind us , let 's have a consensus government where we bring people together .
joshua robertson ( @ jrojourno ) palaszczuk `` very hopeful we are able to form govt '' # qldvotes @ twitterid
billy gordon has won for labor in the far north queensland seat of cook .
this makes him the first male indigenous mp for labor in queensland .
eric deeral was queensland 's first indigenous mp .
he won the same seat for the lnp in 1974 .
before entering politics he served with the army reservists , and worked for the foundation for young australians and north queensland tafe .
gordon will join leeanne enoch in parliament .
the new mp for algester also won for labor tonight , making her the first female indigenous mp .
enoch won her seat with a swing of 17.5 % .
fred mcconnell ( @ fred dash ) leeanne enoch and billy gordon become first indigenous queensland mps for labor .
# qldvotes # auspol

the result will increase pressure on tony abbott 's federal coalition government , which has struggled to implement controversial budget policies and has lagged behind labor in the polls for most of its term , daniel hurst reports : the prime minister stayed away from queensland during the campaign , saying newman wanted to run his own race .

warren truss , the deputy prime minister and nationals leader , said : we must make sure that we 're able to take the people with us so they understand why it 's necessary to do things differently in the future .
truss said a queensland lnp opposition would be well positioned to challenge at the next election and he declined to say who should be the state leader .

queenslanders have now demonstrated a preparedness for volatility and i do n't think any government anywhere can ever after this result consider themselves to be safe , and that 's a good message that all governments should learn , truss said .
it is unlikely we are going to have a result tonight though a hung parliament is looking like a distinct possibility .
with 69.7 % of the vote counted there is a 11.4 % swing to the labor party .
they have gone from nine seats ( two up in by-elections since 2012 ) to 43 .
lnp have 40 seats and the katter 's australian party has two seats .
independent peter wellington will retain his seat which leaves two seats in doubt .
lnp will not form government in their own right at this stage though may form a minority government .
this is despite campbell newman and annastacia palaszczuk ruling out forming government with minority parties or indepdents before the election .
of course we all knew they would sell their arse to form government in the event of a hung parliament .
deputy prime minister warren truss says no government is safe .

daniel hurst ( @ danielhurstbne ) truss has told reporters at the lnp event that the # qldvotes result showed no govt anywhere after this election can consider themselves safe while kate jones parties : news.com.au ( @ newscomauhq ) queenslander !
kate jones downs xxxx beer like a boss after beating newman # qldvotes

documents.title: bill shorten : annastacia brought the lnp to their knees
text: federal opposition leader bill shorten says while the final result is still not known , it is remarkable and happened against all the odds .
this was truly a david and goliath battle - and annastacia palaszczuk has brought goliath to his knees .
shorten says it was a privilege to campaign in queensland - he spent a lot of time up here while tony abbott stayed away .
shorten says he and campbell newman are paying the price for refusing to talk to queenslanders .
[ annastacia fought ] against a party with 80 more seats in parliament .
against a party with a war chest of funding for advertising .
against a government with incumbency and a liberal government in canberra .

documents.title: first indigenous woman elected to queensland parliament
text: leanne enoch , the new labor mp in algester , is the first indigenous woman elected to the queensland parliament , joshua robertson reports .

enoch , the sister of playwright and theatre director wesley enoch , was celebrating with family , some of whom had made the trip to the mainland from stradbroke island ( the enochs are quandamooka mob ) .
she told guardian australia over the phone she was keenly aware of the responsibility of being the first .
i accept when you are the first , you have to open the door as wide as possible , to as many people as possible , whatever those roles may be .
enoch won the seat of algester in southern brisbane with a 17 % swing to the labor party .
labor supporters wave goodbye to campbell newman as he finishes his speech on the television .

joshua robertson ( @ jrojourno ) labor supporters wave campbell newman goodbye # qldvotes my colleague joshua robertson is there waiting to here from annastacia palaszczuk : shadow health spokeswoman jo ann miller , introduced as the mighty fighter of bundamba , has made the first formal address to the labor faithful at the lions soccer club in richlands , in brisbane 's west .
friends , the politics of punishment have gone tonight .
the politics of putting the dollar over decency is also gone tonight .

documents.title: campbell newman : my political career is over .
text: campbell newman is addressing the lnp election function .
he says the result is still not clear but his political career is over .
my political career is over .
it 's over .
the times we are living in are uncertain , i had to make tough decisions but they were necessary and i do truly believe they put queensland in a far , far better place .
we have put the state in a far better place than what we found it .
he says the lnp party room will meet and elect a new leader but does not specify a time .
newman says he wants to particularly thank the people of ashgrove and his staff .
he says perhaps there will be a lnp premier and his staff can be relocated .
he hugs his wife , lisa newman , close .
it 's now time for us to go on with a new chapter in our lives .
this is the lady , the love of my life , andi thank her for supporting me for 13 years in political office and we are going to go off together and have a great life together .

newman also has some words for the mps who have lost their seats : when the history of this government is written people should look long and hard at a political team that did the hard yards , and did n't leak , did n't bitch and moan , they got on with their jobs .
i just wish the community knew you were all men and women of conviction and i wish you the very best .
and he has words for the lnps who have retained their seats : for the mps who have managed to win , you have important work at hand .
we do n't know if you will be in government or in opposition but you will be part of a strong and stable lnp team .
lnp president , bruce mciver , who presided over the lnp 's 2012 mammoth victory watches newman as he declares his political career over .
daniel hurst ( @ danielhurstbne ) lnp president bruce mciver watches campbell newman declare `` my political career is over '' # qldvotes @ twitterid
campbell newman expected to speak within minutes daniel hurst ( @ danielhurstbne ) waiting for newman # qldvotes @ twitterid
at the alp election night party there are predictions of a hung parliament .

my colleague joshua robertson is there : old labor heads remain glued to the tv screen as this astonishing result unfolds , still keeping their hopes in check , saying the state will likely end up with a hung parliament .
but the mood among the rank and file grows increasingly jubilant , partaking in a seemingly inexhaustible supply of party pies and of course , the bar tab .
any labor winner who emerges from now will get a rock star reception .
witness new mount ommaney mp jessica pugh - a stone 's throw from her home ground - who was mobbed by the party faithful and media alike .

documents.title: kevin rudd : a stunning result
text: former prime minister kevin rudd , a queensland man himself , has given his thoughts on tonight : kevin rudd ( @ mrkrudd ) anastacia palaszczuk , against all the odds , and despite all the detractors over the last three years , has delivered a stunning result in qld
here is the full video of kate jones claiming victory in the seat of ashgrove .
kate jones claims victory
annastacia palszczuk 's father , henry palaszczuk , is a former state labor minister himself .
he has arrived at the labor party election event ; annastacia herself is yet to appear .
with 63.2 % of the vote counted there is a 11.7 % swing to the labor party .
they are still short of the 45 seat majority but according to the abc , on the current count , labor has 44 seats and lnp has 39 .
henry says it is still too early to call .
but i 'd much rather be in the labor party 's position than the lnp 's position .
queenslanders , australians , when it comes to elections always get it right .
melinda howells ( @ melindahowells ) proud dad @ twitterid has arrived at the alp function .
says it 's too early to say who 's won # qldvotes
our colleague at the official lnp election event captured this shot of subdued attendees watching kate jones give her victory speech for labor in ashgrove .
despite the atmosphere there , however , it 's still too early to call the overall result .
in light of how the evening is unfolding , it 's interesting to look back on the contrasting atmospheres as campbell newman and annastacia palaszczuk voted earlier today .
link to video : newman subdued and palaszczuk confident as leaders cast their votes
the sunday mail endorsed the lnp for victory last week .
brisbane 's weekday newspaper , the courier mail , backed lnp throughout the campaign .
this is yet another example of the waning influence of newspapers but the rules of politics are being rewritten .
queensland looks to be throwing out a government after just one term when in the last election it reduced the labor government to just seven seats in opposition in an 89-seat parliament .
here is the front page of tomorrow 's sunday mail for those interested : the courier-mail ( @ couriermail ) tomorrow 's first edition front page .
# qldvotes @ twitterid

documents.title: kate jones arrives at victory party : `` history was not written by me ''
text: kate jones has arrived at her election night party after campbell newman rang her to concede defeat .
she apologises for keeping the party waiting and firstly reflects on her 2012 defeat to newman .

when i was defeated in 2012 i retreated back into my community , i retreated back into my family and for the first time in many years i had the opportunity to step back and look on and what i saw happening over the past three years was a queensland that was going backwards .
a queensland where i did n't want to live and a queensland where i did n't want to raise my children .
jones said she then had to put her hand up to contest ashgrove .
jones said it was a decision made by people in ashgrove who came up to her every day saying they did n't like the direction the state was going in .
they wanted a community that was n't divided but one where we work together .
the vote here in ashgrove sends a very clear message : we want a better way going forward .
jones thanks her 500 volunteers and says there were people who had never been politically active to cheers in the room and a yell of a that 's me .
trust can never be bought , it 's something that is earned .
she finishes saying that you only achieve great things when you work as a team .
history was not written by me , it was written by each and every one of you
the mood at the lnp official election function room dire .
my colleague daniel hurst says : a smattering of claps in the lnp room at the prediction the party will retain the seat of redlands - but mostly sombre mood as the dire statewide results come in .
transport minister scott emerson is talking about the huge loss of seats the lnp is suffering .
there is currently a 11.5 % swing to the labor party with 56 % of the vote counted .
this is a disappointing decision .
there 'll be a lot of mps out there who have worked hard over the past three years and my heart goes out to them .
did the electorate get it wrong ?

i always take the view that voters never get it wrong but we had to make tough decisions for the sake of the state and sometimes you make the decisions that are tough even if not in the best political interest .
sarah elks ( @ sarahelks ) lnp function .
there 's a lot of bewildered people here tonight .
# qldvotes
treasurer tim nicholls says campbell newman will be disappointed to lose ashgrove and he and his wife lisa newman worked hard for the community .
i think he does accept the will of the people of ashgrove and i think that is a sign of great maturity .
the media director for the government , lee anderson , tweeted that newman had called kate jones to congratulate her on winning the seat .
53 % of the vote is counted in ashgrove and jones has 54 % of the vote and newman has 45.6 % after preferences are distributed .
that 's a 10.8 % swing to labor .
newman previously held the seat on a margin of 5.7 % .

documents.title: newman loses ashgrove
text: premier campbell newman has conceded defeat in ashgrove to kate jones .
newman has called kate jones to congratulate her on her victory , according to the media director for the government .
treasurer tim nicholls is conceding there looks to be a swing of between 12 % -13 % to labor .
it has been from the alp 's perspective a successful campaign .
they have garnered the we 're not them vote .
there has been no substance from them .
i think it 's worrying governments that do the right thing to repair absolute financial failures [ can face this ] .
this really is an extraordinary night .
for the second election in a row queensland is making history .

after the biggest defeat in history in 2012 , leaving labor with seven seats in an 89 seat parliament it is now looking likely labor will win enough seats to form government and premier campbell newman will lose his seat .
the abc 's analyst antony green says labor is on track to win 46 seats .
they need 45 to form government .
green ca n't believe the swings he 's seeing and stops short of calling the election .
he says it will get down to pre-poll and postal votes .
in ashgrove it is almost certain defeat for newman .
labor 's kate jones has 54.4 % of the vote after preferences .
40.6 % of the votes are counted .

documents.title: julia gillard congratulates annastacia palaszczuk
text: former prime minister julia gillard has congratulated annastacia palaszczuk on her campaign .
with 40.3 % of the vote counted there is a 11.8 % swing to the labor party .
the abc is saying labor is on 44 seats to the lnp 's 35 .
julia gillard ( @ juliagillard ) congratulations to annastacia and the labor team on a hard fought , courageous campaign .
you can rightly be proud of your efforts .
jg .

documents.title: treasurer tim nicholls : sad day for campbell
text: treasurer tim nicholls is stopping short of saying campbell newman has lost his seat but says it will be a real struggle for him to retain it .
it 's a sad day for campbell and for the work he has put into the seat of ashgrove but we still have a fair way to go .
on those numbers it looks like it 's going to be very , very hard .
newman is currently on 45.5 % after preferences to labor 's kate jones on 54.5 % .
40.6 % of the vote is counted .
he is on abc24 and is asked if he will run for leader of the lnp : it 's far too early to start talking about those sorts of things .
i know there 's a certain degree of anxiety there are a lot of seats yet to be determined .
ashgrove does look like it 's going to a big struggle .

documents.title: campbell newman at the lnp election night function
text: tweeted by campbell newman 's media director of the government , lee anderson .
lee anderson ( @ leeandersonqld ) @ davidcurnowqld @ 612brisbane
inside the lnp and labor party official election night functions : joshua robertson ( @ jrojourno ) annastacia palaszczuk 's grandmother beryl says she will be premier .
best quality ?
`` her brain '' # qldvotes @ twitterid daniel hurst ( @ danielhurstbne ) media waiting at lnp event ; talk that they have seen glimpses of newman in a room in the distance # qldvotes @ twitterid

documents.title: abc has 42 seats for labor - three short of the majority
text: over on abc veteran analyst antony green is calling the election : truly remarkable .
no winning call from him yet .
abc has lnp on 37 seats at the moment and alp on 42 .
45 is the magic number to form government .
20.6 % of the votes are counted .
the queensland electoral commission is providing this live stream of seat results by electorate , updated as they come in .
it 's very pretty ( make sure to view in 720p resolution ) .
labor looks to be clawing back the inner-brisbane seats that they lost in 2012 .
bulimba , the most marginal seat in the state on 0.1 % to the lnp , looks to be swinging to labor by 8.8 % with 16 % of the vote counted .
labor 's former mp di farmer is on 55.8 % on two party preferred , while lnp 's aaron dillaway is on 44.2 % .
in brisbane central , another former mp , grace grace , is running against the lnp 's robert cavallucci .
with 13.8 % of the vote counted there 's a 12 % swing to labor with grace on 57 % of the primary vote and lnp on 50.5 % .
after preferences that is basically 50-50 though .
in lockyer , pauline hanson is putting up one hell of a flight .
she 's on 29.7 % of the primary vote !
every party has preferenced her last though so lnp 's ian rickus , who is on 33 % of the primary vote will likely retain it .
katter 's australian party looks likely to retain at least one seat .
in dalrymple 24.1 % of the vote is counted and kap is on 64.5 % of the primary vote meaning shane knuth should see another term through .
stunning sunset in brisbane as the votes are counted .
fred mcconnell ( @ fred dash ) that 's more like it .
# qldvotes # sundown
one of the key seats in the election , mirani , which is between rockhampton and mackay in central queensland , looks like it 's going to be a labor party gain .
the seat has been held by the nationals party ( now lnp ) since 1947 but has been notionally labor since redistibution in 2009 though it continued to be held by lnp mp ted malone .
with 25.8 % of the vote counted there is a 16.4 % swing to labor so it looks like jimmy pearce will be the next mp .
6.8 % of the votes have been counted in ashgrove and labor 's kate jones is far ahead .
she currently has 1080 votes to campbell newman 's 856 .
that translates to 48 % of the primary vote to labor to lnp 's 38 % .

inside the lnp election night function at the brisbane convention centre : daniel hurst ( @ danielhurstbne ) the lnp podium still only a handful of supporters in the room watching abc coverage # qldvotes
our colleague daniel hurst has compiled this detailed graph .
it compares newspoll results for labor and the lnp over the past three years , including this election .
newspoll results for labor and the lnp in queensland the lowest two graph lines chart palaszczuk ( red ) and newman 's ( blue ) net approval since 2012 .
journalists have now been allowed into the lnp 's official function at the brisbane convention centre .
sarah elks ( @ sarahelks ) and we 're in !
# qldvotes
in deputy premier jeff seeney 's seat the palmer united party has put up john bjelke-petersen against seeney .
bjelke-petersen is the son of former nationals party premier , joh .
with 10.8 % of the vote counted seeney is ahead on 47.9 % of the vote and pup is on 26.2 % .
labor is on 16.9 % .
keep in mind , two booths have been counted .
bjelke-petersen is pup 's state party leader and star candidate , clive palmer has been asked on channel nine what he thinks of these numbers .
i do n't think so , he says when one commentator says seeney is likely to retain .
some polling booth results starting to come in , though it 's much too early to declare .
with 0.7 % of the vote counted there is a swing to labor of 8.6 % and away from the lnp of 4.5 % .
labor need an 11 % swing to win government .
the official labor party function is being held at the lions soccer club in richlands .

my colleague joshua robertson is there and he says there is a mood of guarded optimism among the top officials there : one senior party source was not putting too much stock in the channel 9 exit poll giving it to labor , saying he wanted to see a larger sample size .
i 've seen too many people disappointed too many times , the veteran campaigner said .

another senior labor official said a key moment in the count would be when the record amounts of pre-polling votes from that last week - running up to an unprecedented 30 % in some seats - drop into the count a single bundle later this evening , perhaps around 8pm or later .
the more things change , the more they change a lot .
here 's a great pic from outside brisbane 's newspaper , the courier mail , in 1907 , where election results were posted outside .
queensland history ( @ history qld ) posting of the election results on the outside of the courier building , brisbane , 1907 ( @ slqld # qldvotes # qldpol

since the polls are closed journalists are gathering at the official party functions but at liberal national party headquarters for the night , the brisbane convention centre , where campbell newman is spending the night , journalists are yet to be allowed inside .
instead they 've been ordered to stay in the lobby for now .

speaking of ashgrove , channel 7 have got a reachtel exit poll for ashgrove that shows labor 's kate jones has widened her lead over premier campbell newman , who is looking more and more likely to lose his seat .
the poll has labor on 56 % two-party preferred to lnp 's 44 % .
on primaries jones is on 47.7 % in ashgrove and newman is on 40.8 % .
the poll surveyed 991 voters after they voted .

spare a thought for the good burghers of ashgrove , who although they were spared much of the circus in 2012 , still had letterboxes absolutely brimming with election propaganda advertising material .
one person made the below video of all the material she collected during the campaign .
ashgrove junk mail
6pm and polls have officially closed in queensland !
we can expect more exit polls and actual results over the next hour or so .
another suit for queensland , a defamation suit : the electrical trades union has announced that it is suing the liberal national party for defamation , aap reports .
on polling day for the queensland state election , the etu says it has launched legal action against the lnp for an advertisement that appeared on the party 's facebook page .
the union says the advertisement falsely accused its state secretary , peter simpson , of taking money from alleged bikie criminals .
the union is also suing the courier mail for defamation .
mr simpson said in a statement that the courier mail aided the lnp 's smear campaign against the etu .

other defamation suits in queensland : campbell newman has launched a defamation suit against alan jones , who is not currently suing anyone , but has been offered financial help by clive palmer , who is not suing news corp any more but is still suing newman , who also faces a defamation suit from lawyers representing bikies .
breaking : people wear clothes .
the courier-mail ( @ couriermail ) in a bizarre twist of fashion fate , both kate jones and lisa newman are out in the same dress : daniel hurst ( @ danielhurstbne ) .
@ couriermail omg i 'm wearing the same white shirt as newman
it was not just the parties behaving badly at some polling booths today ( see previous post ) .

police are investigating the theft of about $ 1,000 from a coffee cart in ashgrove , aap reports : liz hope 's brew booth has been serving coffees at the st finbarr 's parish school voting station since early saturday morning .
but when her earnings and float of more than $ 1,000 suddenly disappeared she immediately recalled a strange moment when a jittery woman plonked her young child on the cart 's table .
i ca n't prove it , but she was acting very strangely , she was very nervous , ms hope told aap .
the woman had asked to use the cart 's communal sunscreen before suddenly dropping the baby 's bottle .
ms hope says she ducked down to retrieve it and then turned around to serve another patron .
but when she turned back to put the money in the till her takings were gone .
still 30 minutes left at the polls for voters and then we should see the results rolling in .
there are 89 seats in the queensland parliament so the magic number to form government in a party 's own right is 45 .
the lnp currently holds 73 of the seats and labor has nine .
over on sky news the attorney general , george brandis , has predicted the lnp will finish the night with about 50 seats a loss of 23 .

a message from our moon-based correspondent for today 's voters queenslanders : you could vote for campbell newman , or annastacia palaszczuk , or you could change your state forever with a vote for this excellent cassowary .
we strongly recommend clicking here for the full cartoon .
first dog on the moon 's election day cartoon
no doubt there are battles across australia , not just in queensland , for the television remote tonight .
emma wardill ( @ emmajwardill ) i 'm told i have to hand back the tv at 7pm for @ twitterid as `` the @ twitterid only happens every 4 years '' # qldvotes # asiancup

documents.title: first exit poll points to alp victory
text: the first exit poll of the night has an alp victory with labor on 54 % to 46 % on two-party preferred basis - though approach this cautiously .
the channel nine/galaxy poll has labor on a primary vote of 39 % and the lnp on 38 % .
the poll was in 17 electorates and exit polls have been known to show elastic results , though of course the numbers are still interesting to note .
greens are on 10 % .
greens have given their preferences to labor in almost every seat though voters have the option of just voting 1 .
forecast for tonight : large hail , heavy rain and strong swings .
in classic brisbane summer style a storm is rolling in as the polls close .
just when we did n't think the night could get any more dramatic !
it 's suddenly very dark at the guardian australia hq in the cbd and out at annastacia palaszczuk 's hq there has even been hail .
katie cassidy ( @ kcassowary ) # bnestorm view from # greenslopes # brisbane # weather eva milic ( @ evamilic9 ) looks like a big storm brewing !
# goldcoast # 9news david lipson ( @ lipporocks ) see what i mean !
# hailstorm at palaszczuk hq @ twitterid tony auden ( @ tonyauden ) very dangerous thunderstorms in se qld - radar - # bnestorm # 7newsq
be thankful you are n't out to vote in richlands today .
unless you are , in which case , good luck !
melinda howells ( @ melindahowells ) big hail storm hitting alp function at richlands # qldvotes
there were some very strange moments in this campaign .
strangeness is not unique to queensland but weird realities are thrust upon politicians and media alike during any election campaign .
from an mp 's chicken dance in response to questions from a citizen journalist to campbell newman suing broadcaster alan jones you can find the round-up here .
my colleagues fred mcconnell and joshua robertson made this video earlier in the campaign after travelling with newman .
it really captures what the trail is like .
campbell newman 's campaign trail is a weird place to be a journalist .
do you have any video of your queensland election day experience ?
it could be featured here in this very blog .
send any videos to my colleague fred mcconnell at fred.mcconnell @ theguardian.com or tweet him @ twitterid dash
there has been some bad behaviour on the campaign trail today .
the labor party had signs in the colours the queensland electoral commission uses - and no labor insignia - that said to number every square .
labor signage in qec colours .
in queensland voters can just vote 1 and the lnp have been urging them to do this to prevent preferences being distributed .
labor have been urging voters to number every square and put the lnp last .
the lnp tried to get a supreme court injunction against the signage but failed .
you can read the story here .
the abc is reporting lnp volunteers dressed in plain clothes were handing out how to vote cards that looked like material from the greens and had labor numbered last on the cards .
greens have preferenced labor in almost every seat and are urging voters to put the lnp last .
the lnp also had signs in labor colours urging people to just vote 1 .
lnp signage in labor colours .
we have some photos from out and about as queenslanders went to the polls today : campbell newman kisses his wife , lisa , after casting his vote .
newman did n't get to vote for himself , he lives just outside of ashgrove but no doubt he was still casting a vote for the lnp .
queensland premier campbell newman kisses his wife lisa after voting in the state election at newmarket state school in brisbane on saturday .
peled/aapimage a voter kisses annastacia palaszczuk as she campaigns at a polling booth in her electorate , inala .
queensland opposition leader , annastacia palaszczuk , from the australian labor party , is greeted by a voter at a polling station set up at inala state school in brisbane on saturday .
pryke/aapimage a jubilant kate jones waves outside of a polling booth in the seat of ashgrove .

kate jones , labor 's candidate for the queensland state seat of ashgrove , greets voters outside a polling booth in brisbane on saturday peled/aapimage here is some of the lnp signage used at polling booths today : voters view liberal national party banners outside a polling station set up at inala state school in brisbane on saturday .
pryke/aapimage and the alp signage : australian labor party banners are outside a polling station set up at inala state school in brisbane on saturday .
pryke/aapimage

documents.title: labor and lnp neck and neck on election day
text: extraordinary is a word thrown around too easily but the stage is set in queensland for a genuinely extraordinary election result tonight .
premier campbell newman looks set to lose his seat of ashgrove with the latest polls putting labor 's kate jones ahead 55 % to 45 % on a two-party preferred basis .

it could mean he is the first politician in queensland to only ever sit in parliament as the leader and will leave him a one-term wonder and the liberal national party potentially the party to win government without its leader , though its majority is at risk .
less than three years ago the lnp stormed to victory , winning a historic 44 seats and leaving labor in opposition with just seven seats .
many believed this guaranteed the party at least two terms in government , with newman as premier .
instead , the polls are neck and neck with the lnp on 52 % to labor 's 48 % on a two-party preferred basis .
the election will have federal ramifications with tony abbott 's prime ministership already suffering internal criticism .
his re-election pitch next year was looking like it would be similar to newman 's we made tough decisions for the benefit of the economy , do n't return to the chaos of labor .
abbott did not appear on the campaign trail once in queensland though he acknowledged his decision to knight prince philip was a distraction from the lnp 's campaign in the state .
guardian australia will be here all night bringing you the results as they happen and news from each of the leaders parties .

bulletin.text: Labor gains a swing of 11.4% and now holds at least 43 seats with more than two thirds of the vote counted, but requires 45 to form government.
